PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15572018-12-12,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DONALD A. OBONSAWIN of Stouffville, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 18, 2019, in the place of Ralph Chiodo, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
